actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to allow State agencies to elect to use a system of retrospective accounting for the purpose of determining benefits under the Food Stamp Act of 1977, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Food Stamp Act Amendments of 1985 - Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to permit State agencies to use a retrospective accounting system for determining food stamp benefits. Permits State agencies to supplement allotments for households with a significant income loss.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to allow State agencies to elect to use a system of retrospective accounting for the purpose of determining benefits under the Food Stamp Act of 1977, and for other purposes.
